location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.Numbers in pencil in the top right hand corner of the folios (not the circled folio numbers) refer to the notes at the rear of the file (red for received correspondence; black for issued correspondence).

Foliation: the foliation sequence for this description commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 7; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 2-5; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence relating to a recreation ground for the Bahrain Political Agency.The correspondence is mostly between the Political Agent, Bahrain (Reginald George Evelyn William Alban), and the Acting Chief Local Representative of the Bahrein Petroleum Company Limited (Milton H Lipp).Detailed file notes are found on folio 6.
